scenes.title: I made a dorky, dark-skinned, submissive, (secretly slutty) older woman dress up in an erotic outfit I like, and it made her horny to the MAX! She's a beautiful woman with a super horny and sensitive personality. I repeated selfish acts that I could never do with a real girlfriend because she is my only meat onahole. Meari Tsuji
scenes.synopsis:
The second in a new series from Meat Paradise VR -  Metadata monkey note: Holy shit, this doujin of a fucking description is the PREFACE to the porno...none of this shit happens in it, it STARTS after she graduates and returns home. I kneel, NKKVR copywriter. If you didn't have two working parents, "latchkey child" means you had a key to the house as a kid and had to let yourself in because nobody was home. Grab a drink and some popcorn and get ready for Takeshi-kun's fucking life story...
One day when I was a latchkey child, I was playing outside alone after dark when Meari, who lived in the same apartment complex, came to talk to me. Back then, Meari-chan was more energetic than she is now, working hard in her after-school clubs, and she was even a famous athlete who competed in district championships.
One day after school, Meari told me "I'm also a latchkey child...after dark, you know, strange people might try to kidnap us..." so we started hanging out at each other's places until our parents came home.
Meari-chan smelled so good and was so cute. I always had a weird feeling about her, but I just tried to ignore it.
One day I was tired of drawing and playing cards, and then Meari said "I'm tired of studying for this entrance exam," so we started watching a TV drama. There was one of those "bed scenes" where a couple was hugging and kissing each other. I was glued to the screen and Meari-chan tried to change the channel, but I said, "I want to watch until the end." She said, "Oh, you're interested in this? You're kind of cute, for a smartass." It got pretty awkward...
After that, I stopped going to Meari's for a while. One day I was playing outside and Meari came by after practice to ask, "Why haven't you been coming by lately? It's dangerous after dark, so please come over." She said, "I'm sorry for being weird the other day. It's normal to be interested in that stuff anyways since you're a boy, right?" or something like that.
Before I knew it, I had been sucking on Meari-chan's mouth for hours. We started taking baths together, sleeping in the futon together, and touching each other's bodies a lot.
I couldn't stop.

I'd leave home and pretend to go to school in the morning, then once my parents went to work, I'd come back and do nothing but fuck Meari until late at night. She stopped going to club activities and her grades dropped so low that she had to give up on the school she wanted to go to. But we were both addicted so all we did was do it.
I borrowed some dirty books and porn from my classmates and did the things I saw there with Meari.
She didn't seem to understand what I meant, but I made her say and do lots of embarrassing and naughty things.

Meari's behavior changed after she learned to do all that, and her parents were so worried about her that they sent her to a boarding school.

Yesterday, I saw Meari at the apartment complex. Apparently, she graduated and moved back home, so I think I'd like to see her...
